entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 10:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: SSW 30 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
